item.title: Making Spells need Runes
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Could someone please help me? Everytime I make A Spell need Runes it still lets you cast without…
Here’s what my Low Alchemy looks like.

else if(castSpell == 1162) // low Alch
{
if(playerLevel[6] >= 21) 
{
if(!playerHasItemAmount(561, 10))
{
sendMessage("You do not have enough runes to cast this spell.");
}
else if(playerHasItemAmount(561, 10))
{
alchvaluez = (alchvaluez / 5);
deleteItem(castOnItem, castOnSlot, 1);
addItem(995, alchvaluez);
addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[6]), 6);
startAnimation(287);
playerGfx(5, 0);
deleteItem(561,getItemSlot(561), 10);
newAnimDelay = 6;
newAnim = 712;
newAnimRequired = true;
} 
}

But when I Compile & Run it still lets me cast without the runes, someone help me please.

Read full topic
